an improv hash code for scatter storag introduc is ahash code method base on fix point divis rather thanmultipl or logic oper thi new method allow the hashtabl to have almost ani length also a new methodof handl collis is discuss known as quadrat search thimethod is faster than random search and free from thecluster that build up with a linear search cacm januari1968 maurer w d hash code hash tabl scatter storagsearch 3 74 4 11 4 12 4 9 ca680108jb februari 23 1978 2 31 pm 1786 5 17861786 5 1786 1786 5 1786 1860 5 1786 19735 1786 1992 5 1786 2018 5 1786 2033 51786 2107 5 1786 2109 5 1786 2203 5 17862251 5 1786 2543 5 1786 2573 5 1786 27705 1786 911 6 1786 1314 6 1786 1366 61786 1389 6 1786 1421 6 1786 1496 6 17861626 6 1786 1641 6 1786 1785 6 1786 17856 1786 1785 6 1786 1785 6 1786 1785 61786 1785 6 1786 1785 6 1786 1785 6 17861785 6 1786 1786 6 1786 1786 6 1786 17866 1786 1786 6 1786 1786 6 1786 1786 61786 1786 6 1786 1786 6 1786 1786 6 17861786 6 1786 1786 6 1786 1786 6 1786 18696 1786 1973 6 1786 1973 6 1786 1973 61786 1992 6 1786 332 6 1786 378 6 17862018 6 1786 2018 6 1786 2018 6 1786 21076 1786 2107 6 1786 2107 6 1786 2107 61786 2107 6 1786 2107 6 1786 2109 6 17862109 6 1786 2109 6 1786 2109 6 1786 21096 1786 2109 6 1786 2673 6 1786 492 61786 3184 6 1786
